Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 114th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Shayne Funk (MON)...
10/5/2015: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $15,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2015...
Injured on 5/5/2016 with a Fractured Foot, out for 2-3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2016, hitting .417 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 10/8/2016 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/8/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $6,055,000 per year...
Had 24-game hitting streak snapped on 6/10/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2019, hitting .433 with 1 HR, 2 RBI...
Injured on 5/19/2020 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2022, hitting .427 with 1 HR, 22 RBI...
Injured on 8/1/2022 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 10/17/2022 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/15/2023 to a 3-year deal worth $4,330,000 per year...
Injured on 6/2/2023 with a Strained Back, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Houston to St. Louis (B) on 7/20/2023 (Going to HOU: C Luther Cutlip, P Ray Hartley. Going to SLB: CF James Bradwell)...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Detroit on 6/15/2024 (Going to DET: CF James Bradwell. Going to SLB: RF Leonel Calhoun)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2024, hitting .333 with 3 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 2025 Allstar game...
